recent_achievements: Session 114: OpenCode architecture analysis (8.6/10) - Analyzed OpenCode source from GitHub. Documented package structure, agent system, tool system, Task tool internals. Created integration plan with 4 customization options. Recommended plugin + wrapper approach.

Session 114: Enhanced OpenCode conversation tracking (8.5/10) - Improved sync command saves rich session data with tool patterns, topics, file changes to memory/opencode-sessions.json. Added learn command for extracting insights. Migrated to shared utilities.

Session 114: Deep codebase analysis & code quality improvements (8.6/10) - Created comprehensive analysis doc, built 8-file shared utilities module (json-utils, colors, time-utils, string-utils, paths, config, types, index), migrated 6 CLI tools removing ~200 lines of duplicated code

Session 110: Session 106 continuation: Refactored memory system (8.2/10) - Added automatic session knowledge extraction on session.end, extractSessionKnowledge function for tool pattern analysis, summarize-current command for quiet auto-summarization, and Memory System Architecture documentation in AGENTS.md

Session 106: Session 106 continuation: Added real-time Performance tab to dashboard-ui (8.3/10) with tool execution times chart, agent efficiency leaderboard, error pattern alerts, and optimization suggestions panel. WebSocket integration for real-time updates.
